Texts.Eng:
An energy-packed fruit-flavored bar. It is recommended that you eat no more than two per day. Should your fruitiness exceed a certain threshold and become a concern, a visit to the doctor is recommended; but this bar is realistically incapable of changing your sexual preferences.
^green;Type: Fruit Dessert^reset;
Texts.Chs:
充满活力的水果味酒吧。建议你每天吃不超过两个。如果你的果味超过一定的阈值并成为一个问题，建议去看医生；但这家酒吧实际上无法改变你的性取向。
 ^green;类型：水果甜点^reset;
